dublin_core.dcvalue: Prevalence data are collected on smartphones using a mapping platform that allows for GPS readings to be linked to households surveyed administered by trained survey teams. The platform enables partners, MOH and stakeholders to tailor trachoma elimination programs. Over 1 million people in 6 countries have been checked for Trachoma as of September 2013.
